name: Hero Planter
description:
Get your green thumb ready, because this Roguelite farm simulator is like no other! Each dungeon is unique and unpredictable. Master the art of growing plants and defend them against waves of sneaky pests to become the ultimate Hero Planter.

Features

  • Go through 100 procedurally generated dungeons floors.
  • Avoid poisonous fog, falling stalactites, and stock up on lamps to dispel the darkness of the dungeon.
  • You only have one life. Put your skills to the test.



  • Fertilize the soil to plant the crop.
  • Don't forget that plants need light and water.
  • The grown crops can be sold or given to the population for food.
  • Find new seeds and grow about 30 crops.



  • Prepare about 40 dishes from the grown plants.
  • To find all the recipes, kill as many pests as possible.



  • Your enemies are harmful garden pests. Some can attack you, some eat your crops.
  • Enemies smell the plants and gnaw burrows on the floor.
